name: Artificial Intelligence
description: Artificial Intelligence involves machines performing tasks that typically require human intelligence.

name: Machine Learning
description: Machine Learning enables systems to learn and improve from experience without being explicitly programmed.

name: Operating System
description: An Operating System manages computer hardware and software resources and provides services for programs.

name: Database Management System
description: A DBMS provides an interface for users to create, retrieve, update, and manage data efficiently.

name: Web Development
description: Web Development involves building and maintaining websites using frontend and backend technologies.

name: Networking
description: Networking involves connecting computers and devices to share resources and information.

name: Pattern Recognition
description: Pattern Recognition is the automated recognition of patterns and regularities in data.

name: Neural Network
description: Neural Networks are computing systems inspired by biological neural networks that learn to perform tasks.

name: Statistics
description: Statistics is the study of data collection, analysis, interpretation, presentation, and organization.

name: Computer Fundamentals
description: Computer Fundamentals cover the basic concepts of computing, hardware, software, and their applications.
